page.title: 18SHOPPING IN AMBLE
page.content: There is{a variety of shops}in Amble, which{serve the surrounding area. {Shoppers}come from Amble, Warkworth, Acklington and Hadston. Amble mainly provides{lower order shopping goods, such as bread, fruit and groceries. There are{three larger supermarkets: Co-op, Walter Wilsons and Liptons. Recently many{shops have closed, including three furniture stores - indicating the lack of demand for these types of goods in Amble. {Newcastle is a greater attraction. Shoppers tend to{use Amble fairly {frequently -}at least twice a week. There is{a number of specialist stores e.g. cobblers, tele-hire, DIY stores. Their existence is due to the demand for such services i.e. three DIY stores exist because of the numbers employed in the construction trade. Soon{a new store is to be opened.
